mapper.select: select * from t_role r,t_user_role ur where r.id=ur.role_id and ur.user_id=#{id}

SELECT h.id,h.name,h.keyword,h.description FROM (SELECT e.* FROM t_role r,(SELECT t.id,t.username,ur.`role_id` FROM t_user t INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON t.id=ur.user_id AND username=#{username}) e WHERE r.id=e.role_id) f, (SELECT * FROM t_role_permission rp,t_permission p WHERE rp.permission_id=p.id) h WHERE f.role_id=h.role_id
